channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 韩国央行预计将保持基准利率稳定，因为它正在进行董事会重组，这可能会影响到今年晚些时候潜在政策中枢的时间安排。
item.description: The Bank of Korea is expected to hold its benchmark interest rate steady as it undergoes a reorganization of its board that may influence the timing of a potential policy pivot later this year trib.al/m5hgczp

item.title: 随着泰国央行面临越来越大的降息政治压力，大多数分析师预计货币管理机构将抵制为支持经济而采取任何非周期性宽松政策的呼吁。
item.description: As Bank of Thailand comes under growing political pressure to cut interest rates, most analysts expect the monetary authority to resist calls for any off-cycle easing to support the economy trib.al/d0pPWdP

item.title: 中美日益紧张的关系促使日本在芯片制造上押注 670 亿美元
item.description: Growing US-China tensions are pushing Japan to bet $67 billion on its chip-making ambitions trib.al/YwoNlBo

item.title: 一个加密货币行业组织称，伊丽莎白-沃伦提出的反犯罪立法将有效扼杀美国的加密货币行业
item.description: A crypto industry group says anti-crime legislation from Elizabeth Warren would effectively kill the sector in the US trib.al/5ywdY9S

item.title: 硅谷正在重新思考在华盛顿特区建立关系的问题。
item.description: Silicon Valley is rethinking its relationship building in D.C. trib.al/tNs8Ri8

item.title: 伊利诺伊州正面临着三年来的首次预算赤字，因为该州要应对从教育到移民服务等各项成本的上涨。
item.description: Illinois is facing its first budget deficit in three years as the state deals with rising costs for everything from education to services for migrants trib.al/IXV2HRI

item.title: 一系列强风暴中的最新一场风暴再次给加州带来雨雪天气，促使官员警告居民保持高度警惕，以防洪水泛滥
item.description: The latest in a series of robust storms is drenching California again with rain and snow, prompting officials to warn residents to stay on high alert for floods trib.al/ZLikM1w

item.title: 随着利率达到顶峰，澳大利亚最大的养老基金正在失去对债券的兴趣。它们转而加大了对潜在风险较高的高回报途径的押注：私人信贷
item.description: Australia’s biggest pension funds are losing their appetite for bonds as interest rates peak. They are instead ramping up bets on a potentially riskier avenue of higher returns: private credit trib.al/yQvyJJe

item.title: 参议院银行委员会主席谢罗德-布朗（Sherrod Brown）敦促美联储加强其对美联储官员金融市场交易的政策
item.description: Senate Banking Committee Chair Sherrod Brown is urging the Fed to strengthen its policies on financial market trading by Fed officials trib.al/82ilxNp

item.title: 前 Celsius 首席执行官亚历克斯-马辛斯基（Alex Mashinsky）表示，他可以放心地使用与 FTX 创始人塞缪尔-班克曼-弗里德（Samuel Bankman-Fried）相同的律师，为他辩护，指控他抬高公司加密货币的价格。
item.description: Former Celsius CEO Alex Mashinsky said he was comfortable using the same lawyers as FTX founder Samuel Bankman-Fried to defend him against charges that he pumped up the price of his firm’s cryptocurrency trib.al/gX6zrUl

item.title: RT by @markets：NVDA 的收益将决定很多事情：根据期权定位，市值接近 2000 亿美元。
item.description: There's a lot riding on NVDA's earnings: close to $200 billion in market value, per options positioning bloomberg.com/news/articles/… via @technology @markets

item.title: 加拿大总理贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）表示，在通胀率降至央行目标范围内后，他希望加拿大央行能尽快开始放宽货币政策。
item.description: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau said he’s hopeful the Bank of Canada will soon start easing monetary policy after the rate of inflation fell to within the central bank’s target range trib.al/lhjC92I

item.title: 墨西哥足球和博彩企业 Ollamani SAB 从付费电视运营商 Grupo Televisa SAB 分拆上市后，其股价周二大涨，使这家新上市公司的市值达到约 50 亿比索（约合 2.93 亿美元）。
item.description: Shares of Mexican soccer and gambling business Ollamani SAB surged Tuesday following its spinoff from pay TV operator Grupo Televisa SAB, driving the market value of the newly listed company to around 5 billion pesos ($293 million) trib.al/NiYbog1

item.title: 彼得森国际经济研究所（Peterson Institute for International Economics）高级研究员奥利维耶-布兰查德（Olivier Blanchard）认为，美国近年来赤字膨胀，有爆发财政危机的危险。
item.description: The US is in danger of a fiscal crisis erupting after a ballooning in deficits in recent years, according to Olivier Blanchard, a senior fellow at the Peterson Institute for International Economics trib.al/zhuVmWa

item.title: 虽然美联储的一项关键流动性机制正处于低位，但市场分析人士称，央行很可能会继续缩减资产负债表
item.description: While a key Federal Reserve liquidity facility is running low, market analysts say the central bank likely will keep shrinking its balance sheet trib.al/BWRW2Kd

item.title: 法国正准备召开首次会议，讨论通过中东将印度与欧洲连接起来的基础设施，以应对中国的类似倡议
item.description: France is preparing a first meeting to discuss an infrastructure link that would connect India to Europe via the Middle East to counter a similar Chinese initiative trib.al/apMe8sF

item.title: 加拿大总理贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）周二宣布，加拿大政府将提供高达 20 亿加元（15 亿美元）的低成本融资，以加快中等收入家庭的住房建设。
item.description: The Canadian government will provide up to C$2 billion ($1.5 billion) in low-cost financing to accelerate homebuilding for middle-income families, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau announced Tuesday. trib.al/p0nrfWl

item.title: 欧元区 12 月建筑业产出增长 1.9%，创 2 月以来最高增幅
item.description: Euro-zone construction output rose by 1.9% in December, the highest increase since February trib.al/2juM2mp

item.title: 反对党领袖阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼（Alexey Navalny）去世后，美国计划于周五公布针对俄罗斯的 "重大制裁方案
item.description: The US plans to unveil a “major sanctions package” against Russia on Friday following the death of opposition leader Alexey Navalny trib.al/dMIDjrE

item.title: KeyCorp 首席执行官 Chris Gorman 称，该公司的商业房地产贷款风险已得到控制，而这正是美国地区性银行投资者所关注的领域。
item.description: KeyCorp Chief Executive Officer Chris Gorman touted his company’s contained exposure to commercial real estate lending — an area of concern for investors in regional US banks trib.al/RKtWEff

item.title: 普林斯顿大学计划利用 4 万亿美元的市政债券市场，为其新泽西校区的资本项目融资
item.description: Princeton University plans to tap the $4 trillion municipal bond market to help finance capital projects on its New Jersey campus trib.al/RF4AuOX

item.title: 德国国有能源集团 SEFE 承诺维持与俄罗斯的天然气供应合同
item.description: German state-owned energy group SEFE pledges to keep a natural gas supply contract with Russia trib.al/ZC7wHZk

item.title: 英国财政大臣杰里米-亨特计划鼓励养老基金投资英国资产
item.description: UK Chancellor Jeremy Hunt plans to spur pension funds to invest in UK assets trib.al/QWQJHQq

item.title: 经济型航空公司易捷航空（EasyJet）在大流行病期间退出英国富时 100 指数近四年后，有望重新跻身该指数榜单。
item.description: Budget airline EasyJet is on track to reclaim its place in the UK’s FTSE 100 index almost four years after it dropped out during the pandemic trib.al/ETQzVW1

item.title: 据全美房地产经纪人协会称，与十年前相比，现在拥有住房的美国人明显增多，但黑人住房拥有率与其他种族和族裔群体住房拥有率之间的差距却越来越大。
item.description: Significantly more Americans own a home now than a decade ago, but the disparity between Black homeownership rates and those of other racial and ethnic groups has grown wider, according to the National Association of Realtors. trib.al/d4isYKm

item.title: 南非总统西里尔-拉马福萨表示，南非将于 5 月 29 日举行大选
item.description: South Africa will hold elections on May 29, President Cyril Ramaphosa said trib.al/iETNUcJ

item.title: 尼日利亚在一次债券拍卖中筹集了 1.5 万亿奈拉（约合 9.96 亿美元），政府提供的收益率吸引了众多投资者
item.description: Nigeria raised 1.5 trillion naira ($996 million) in a bond auction as the yield offered by the government helped lure investors trib.al/0uYUAsC

item.title: 巴克莱银行首席执行官文卡塔克里什南（C.S. Venkatakrishnan）一直在审查公司的战略。事实证明，修修补补就足够了
item.description: Barclays CEO C.S. Venkatakrishnan been reviewing his firm’s strategy. It turns out, pruning around the edges was enough trib.al/DFIAGAZ

item.title: 英国伯明翰市议会拟大幅削减预算。由于其他市议会也存在预算问题，这可能不是最后一次。与 @h_chandlerwilde 一起了解最新消息
item.description: Huge cuts are proposed for the city council of Birmingham, UK. With budget problems in other councils, it might not be the last. Get The Readout with @h_chandlerwilde trib.al/m69EZ2e

item.title: 副总统巴拉特-贾格迪奥（Bharatt Jagdeo）在接受采访时说，圭亚那正在探索将埃克森公司正在钻探的油田中蕴藏的巨大天然气资源货币化的方案。
item.description: Guyana is exploring options to monetize the enormous natural gas resources held within its oil fields where Exxon. is drilling, Vice President Bharatt Jagdeo said in an interview trib.al/MgZZf3E
